appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Delicious deep-fried mozzerella with a side of homemade marinara for dipping!

appetizers.name: Potato Skins
appetizers.description: Potato skins baked to perfection topped with melted cheese, bacon bits, chives and drizzled with sour cream..... It's sure to be a group favorite!

appetizers.name: Buffalo Wings
appetizers.description: Things wings have a bite, but nothing to be afraid of.  Try dipping it in our homemade blue cheese dressing to cool them down and add some terrific flavor! Served with carrots and celery sticks.

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey
cold sandwiches.description: Moist, freshly-carved turkey breast is a healthy, delicious choice.

cold sandwiches.name: Roast Beef
cold sandwiches.description: Savory, flavorful roast beef is a delicious, traditional lunchtime staple.

cold sandwiches.name: Chicken Caesar
cold sandwiches.description: Perfectly roasted chicken covered in delicious caesar dressing. Not your typically chicken sandwich!

hot sandwiches.name: BLT
hot sandwiches.description: American classic, thick cut bacon paired with crip lettuce and fresh tomatoes make this sandwich local favorite!

hot sandwiches.name: Reuben
hot sandwiches.description: This german-inspired sandwich is sure to wake up your tastebuds.

hot sandwiches.name: Tuna Melt
hot sandwiches.description: This sandwich will take you back to your childhoom.  Deliious tuna on white bread with melted cheddar to top it off. Does it get better than this?

desserts.name: Milk and cookies
desserts.description: Ice-cold milk served with 2 warm chocolate chip cookies. Need we say more?

desserts.name: New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy, smooth, sweet. Topped with strawberries, this will put a smile on your face.
